creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: at bottom: male figure in flat boat, gazing upward toward a wispy willow tree at L; reeds at bottom and rectangular intaglio stamp LRC; at center, three small birds flying; at top, mountains in the distance; four line inscription at top with square relief stamp at L; gilt edges
markings: LRC, rectangular intaglio; ULC, square relief; on back, taped to center, Japanese inscription
title: Boating
